resources.string: This page shows the master list of all registered Clinical Decision Support (CDSS) libraries in your installation of SanteDB. These libraries form the basis of any clinical protocols, decision support rules, and facts. Please be sure to read the CDSS Documentation on the SanteSuite Wiki before modifying these rules, as they may have an adverse impact on patient care.

Select a CDSS library definition file from your hard drive to import into the SanteDB instance. If you upload a file with an identifier or UUID matching an existing library, this will update the existing file, otherwise the library will be imported

This tool is used to upload a new version of this CDSS library using a raw definition file. This option is useful if you are authoring your CDSS rules using the CDSS XML library format or the CDSS text format. This method of maintaining a CDSS library is preferred, since it provides complete access to the CDSS engine's functionality. Before continuing, please consult the CDSS Documentation on the SanteSuite Wiki for more information about these formats.
Cannot publish an invalid CDSS file. Please ensure all validation errors are corrected
Are you sure you want to publish this CDSS definition? Note: If your CDSS definition lists a state of ACTIVE it will apply to all patient encounters on this system
CDSS definition has been published successfully to the server

Use the source editor to change the CDSS definition. Shortcuts:

  • CTRL+F: Find
  • CTRL+H: Find/Replace
  • CTRL+S: Save/Publish
  • F9: Run/Test Library
  • CTRL+U: Convert text to upper case
  • CTRL+SHIFT+U: Convert text to lower case
Select the type of object against which the rules will tested
Select whether the test object will be an arbitrary object (specified by you) or an existing record from the database
